Schedule an appointment, make it your online learning process easier
This application helps streamline the process of consulting in a simple and user-friendly way.
Verify and confirm your assigned counseling. Minimum two hours per week.
This application will help to streamline the process of conducting consultancies in a simple and user-friendly way.
How can I schedule an appointment?
First, you have to make sure if there is a FAQ that can solve your question or problem. To do this, you must enter the Menu, then click down to "Help" and search for the question or problem you have.

In case you do not find any question that can solve your problem, the next step is to go to the contact button in the same activity. Another method to access this part is to go to the menu and click on the "Contact" option.

Once inside this part, you will have the options of contacting some of the methods shown or sending a personalized message within the application. Once you send this message, a coordinator will contact you.

In order to schedule an appointment, you need to go to the Menu, then click on Schedule, once inside, you will see a list of subjects, of which, by clicking on any of them, you will see a list of the subjects offered for that career.

Once you click on a subject that interests you, you will be sent to another activity, where you will be able to see the details of the appointment, in case you want to take it, click on the button to request it.

Once you have scheduled your counseling, you will have to go to the appointments option, within the menu, to verify that your subject has been uploaded. Remember that at the end of each counseling you must scan the QR code that your teacher will provide you with, this is done by accessing the appointment.
